definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: They asked me for my impressions of the fair tonight.
sentences.chinese: 他們約請我今晚去談談對交易會的印象。

sentences.english: Yesterday I travelled to the Bangor State Fair in Maine.
sentences.chinese: 我於昨天前往緬因州班戈農牧產品交易會。

sentences.english: IMB 2006 - World fair for apparel production technology & textile processing.
sentences.chinese: 國際服裝生產技術及紡織處理交易會。

sentences.english: My company presider sent me to attent the 7th china Hi-Te fair yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 公司的領導派我去參加中國國際高新技術交易會。

sentences.english: The regulations come into force as of the day of promulgation.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法解釋權歸交易會組委會，並於發佈之日起生效。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus service between Trade Fair Center and hotel is available.
sentences.chinese: 交易會期間免費提供穿梭巴士往返交易會會場。

sentences.english: Free shuttle bus service between Trade Fair Center and hotel is available.
sentences.chinese: 交易會期間免費提供穿梭巴士往返交易會會場。

sentences.english: This is your first visit to the Fair, I presume.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想，這是您頭一次參觀這個交易會。

sentences.english: Welcome to Shanghai Import and Export Commodities Fair.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨上海進出口商品交易會。

sentences.english: The british embassy is holding a party for exhibitor at the trade fair .
sentences.chinese: 英國大使館正在爲交易會的參展者舉行晚會。

sentences.english: The Lifestyle Fair showcased various European color trends like yellows and purples.
sentences.chinese: 交易會可展示不同的歐洲色彩，像黃色和紫色。

sentences.english: It was displayed at the Fall Fair in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 它在廣州秋季交易會上展出。

sentences.english: Hello. Mr. Wang. I am glad to meet you here at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 你好，於先生，很高興在交易會上見到你。

sentences.english: The International Trade Fair for Food and Catering Products was held in Poznan, Poland.
sentences.chinese: 國際食品餐飲交易會在波蘭波茲南舉行。

sentences.english: All banking transactions will be recorded in your bankbook.
sentences.chinese: 所有的銀行交易會記錄在你的銀行存摺上。

sentences.english: You might even go to a tradeshow with fine results.
sentences.chinese: 你也可能回去個交易會，而且收穫不錯。

definition: the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
direct, winner-takes-all system of election in use for village committees/preselection for a competition
(of an organization etc) standing or permanent
